en.title: Representative's Details
en.line1: Please enter details of the representative as stated on your tribunal form.
en.line2: We will only use these details to contact this representative about this case.
en.contactNumberHint: Enter a contact number in the correct format, like 01632 960 001 or 07700 900 982
en.emailAddressHint: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com

cy.title: Manylion y cynrychiolydd
cy.line1: Rhowch fanylion y cynrychiolydd fel y’u nodir ar eich ffurflen tribiwnlys.
cy.line2: Byddwn ond yn defnyddio’r manylion hyn i gysylltu â’r cynrychiolydd ynghylch yr achos hwn.
cy.contactNumberHint: Enter a contact number in the correct format, like 01632 960 001 or 07700 900 982 (WELSH)
cy.emailAddressHint: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com (WELSH)

representativeFullName.required: Enter full name of the representative
representativeFullName.containsMarkdownLink: Full name must not include a link
representativeFullName.containsInvalidCharacters: Full name must not include HTML

representativeOrganisationName.required: Enter organisation or business name of the representative
representativeOrganisationName.containsMarkdownLink: Organisation or business name must not include a link
representativeOrganisationName.containsInvalidCharacters: Organisation or business name must not include HTML

representativeContactNumber.required: Enter a contact number of the representative
representativeContactNumber.invalid: Enter a contact number in the correct format

representativeEmailAddress.required: Enter an email address of the representative
representativeEmailAddress.invalid: Enter an email address in the correct format

representativeOrganisationName.containsMarkdownLink: Nid yw'r data a gofnodwyd yn ddilys ar gyfer enw Sefydliad neu fusnes. Ni chaniateir nodau marcio i lawr yn y maes hwn.

representativeEmailAddress.invalid: Mae pob cyfeiriad e-bost yn cynnwys tair elfen: rhan lleol, symbol @ (a ynganir fel “at”), ac enw parth
